attributes.action: Give police the right to take down motorcycle thieves by any means necessary!
attributes.background: Motorcycle theft in Edinburgh and surrounding area is out of control, something needs to be done before people do it for themselves!

rejection.details:
Policing in Scotland is devolved, which means it is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can get in contact with them at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
